column4: hey. can we have some help getting ubuntu to work on a vista machine?
do we need to burn the iso, or unzip the files and then burn to disc
and then boot from bios or in windows?
can i use roxio or nero to burn the cd?
be sure to burn it as an image, not a data cd
how do we burn it as an image pls
a bootable image, yes. Not as a data disk. Don't know the nero interface, but there's a difference
ill use that cd as a coaster
